tool_description: Creates structured activity schedules combining multiple learning activities with optimal timing, transitions, and learning flow for specified time periods.

activity_ids.description: List of activity IDs to include in schedule

schedule_duration_hours.description: Total duration for the schedule in hours (0.5-8)

start_time.description: Preferred start time in HH:MM format

break_frequency_minutes.description: How often to schedule breaks in minutes (15-120)

energy_flow.description: Preferred energy flow: high_to_low, low_to_high, or mixed

learning_goals.description: Primary learning goals to optimize schedule around

transition_time_minutes.description: Time allocated for transitions between activities (2-15)

include_snack_breaks.description: Whether to include snack breaks in the schedule

flexibility_level.description: Schedule flexibility: rigid, moderate, or flexible

error_messages: Insufficient activities: At least 2 activities must be provided for scheduling.
Invalid duration: schedule_duration_hours must be between 0.5 and 8 hours.
Invalid age: child_age_months must be between 6 and 216 months.
Invalid start time: Use HH:MM format (00:00-23:59).
Invalid break frequency: break_frequency_minutes must be between 15 and 120 minutes.
Invalid energy flow: Must be one of [high_to_low, low_to_high, mixed].
Invalid transition time: transition_time_minutes must be between 2 and 15 minutes.
Invalid flexibility: flexibility_level must be one of [rigid, moderate, flexible].
Duration mismatch: Total activity time exceeds available schedule duration.
Activity not found: One or more activity IDs are not recognized.
usage: Provide activity IDs, schedule duration, and child's age. Optionally customize start time, break frequency, energy flow, learning goals, transition time, snack breaks, and flexibility level for an optimized schedule.

schedule_timeline.description: Chronological schedule with times and activities

total_active_time.description: Total active learning time in minutes

learning_progression.description: Description of how learning builds throughout the schedule

schedule_summary.description: Overview of the created schedule and its key features

flexibility_notes.description: Notes about schedule flexibility and adaptation options
